laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: At age 42, serum calcium increased to 10.8 mg/dL. After resection at age 46, levels fell to 8.9 mg/dL, then rose to 9.9 mg/dL at the most recent follow-up.
At age 42, intact PTH increased to 105.2 pg/mL. After resection at age 46, levels fell to 10 pg/mL, then increased to 56 pg/mL at the most recent follow-up.
